docs.text: DB Structure of AffilBoost [IN DEVELOPMENT PROCESS] Users There are 3 types of users : Seller Marketer Customer User Table This is the main table for Users. userID fullName email profilePicUrl address isVerified isOnline accountType createdAt Account Type Table This is the table specifying the type of user. ID accountType isSeller isMarketer isCustomer Seller Details Table Extra Details for Sellers - Will Add Fields later. ID govDocImgLink - Government Document Photo Image Link documentType - Type of document : Government, Driver Licence, Passport Marketer Details Table Extra Details for Sellers - Will Add Fields later. ID govDocImgLink - Government Document Photo Image Link Customer Details Table Extra Details for Sellers - Will Add Fields later. ID Products Product Table This is main table of Product. productID name coverImage description marketPrice affilPercent - Percentage for marketer which will be added to marketPrice. totalPrice user_ID ProductAnalytics ID productID totalSales totalAffilateLinks totalViews Orders Order Table orderID customerUserID productID totalAmount isPaid purchasedAt location shippingAddress trackingID
